channel.title: A brief of composite automation harness on TestNX
channel.description: Recent content in A brief of composite automation harness on TestNX

item.title: Install and setup
item.description: Install JDK8+ or OpenJDK8+ Install Maven3+ Add the composite-automation-harness dependency to your maven project <dependency> <groupId>tech.testnx.cah</groupId> <artifactId>composite-automation-harness</artifactId> <version>3.0.4</version> </dependency>
